:bulb: You can initialize a Git repository<br>
:bulb: You can stage and commit changes<br>
:bulb: You know how to explore the commit history<br>
:bulb: You can compare different commits<br>
:bulb: You know how to use and create a `.gitignore` file<br>
:bulb: You can discuss which files can (not) be tracked well with Git and why<br>
:bulb: You know how to track empty folders in Git repositories
